responses.rationale: Reports a neutral fact (absence of infection in lower respiratory tract) without explicit calming language.
Reports a neutral fact and a bare negation ('not an issue') without explicit calming keywords.
Reports a negative fact neutrally without explicit calming language.
Reports a negative fact and asks a question without explicit calming language.
A statement about past experience without explicit calming language.
